conversation.text: I'm in the mood for a prison movie. Could you recommend a few?

conversation.speaker: SYSTEM
conversation.text: If you're in the mood for a high-octane, action-packed prison movie, I'd highly recommend "The Condemned." Starring Nathan Jones and Sullivan Stapleton, it's about a group of convicted killers forced to fight each other on a remote island for survival. On the other hand, if you prefer a more gritty and suspenseful take on prison life, "Below Zero" might be right up your alley. This film revolves around a policeman who survives a brutal prison assault and fortifies his position while the inmates hunt him down. Enjoy the movies!

Another movie that might appeal to you is "Providence". This film follows the lives of two individuals growing up in a small town and their eventual reunion many years later, offering a poignant exploration of fate and friendship. Enjoy your movie time!
